vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
πειρ-ασμός, ὁ,
trial, [LXX+NT]; οἱ ἐπὶ τῶν παθῶν π. [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__2 worry, [LXX]
__II temptation,[LXX+NT]

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
test; trial; temptation
a putting to the proof, proof, trial, 1Pet. 4:12; Heb. 3:8; direct temptation to sin, Lk. 4:13; trial, temptation, Mt. 6:13; 26:41; 1Cor. 10:13; trial, calamity, affliction, Lk. 22:28
vocabinfos._es_Definition: período o proceso de prueba, juicio, prueba ; tentación, incitación ; fuego de la prueba (1PE.4:12)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 試驗, 嚐試
2) 引誘, 試探
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 试验, 尝试
2) 引诱, 试探
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: sự thử thách; sự cám dỗ. Xem G3985
